title.narrative: Increase capacity and resilience of poor people Social Protection

description.narrative: Social Protection - UNICEF, 1. Active case finding and community mobilization implemented to increase timely referral and demand for life-saving nutrition services ,2. Increased access to life-saving nutrition interventions particularly management of acute malnutrition amongst the most vulnerable population in drought affected provinces,3. Strengthened monitoring and information management of nutrition situation and response in affected provinces

Support the implementation of mass nutrition screening activities and referral of acutely malnourished children for treatment through community health workers and NGOs supported community platforms, 2.Support training and deployment of mobile health teams, including provision of technical and material support, transport and transport allowances to implement treatment of acute malnutrition through health facility and mobile health teams, 3.Provision of technical and financial support to SETSAN seasonal assessment (Technical Secretariat for Food Security and Nutrition)
